title: The Last Kamikazes
itunes:title: The Last Kamikazes
itunes:subtitle: BBC journalist Mariko Oi discusses her experiences of interviewing some of the last survivors of the notorious Japanese raids in World War Two, in advance of her new documentary on BBC World Service
description:
BBC journalist Mariko Oi discusses her experiences of interviewing some of the last survivors of the notorious Japanese raids in World War Two, in advance of her new documentary on BBC World Service

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
